name: Blast Ball (itch)
description:
Visit Website A Fun Cartoonish Football Game

Have a blast with these bobble head ballers and run it in for the score. “Blast Ball“ is a fun, cartoon-like football game that is simple and easy but has depth. Deliver big hits with hilarious collisions, watch ballers crash together mid-air and flip with soft-is ragdoll body physics.

"If Bobble-Heads came to life that are slightly talented football players." - Me, Pick Up The Ball And Run To Daylight

Ballers can stiff arm, hurdle, spin, truck, strafe, block, dive and more as they go for the score or a last second touchdown save. All of this in front of an live and vibrant stadium filled with fans cheerleaders, coaches and ballers on the sideline that react to the action on the field. It's a game that is fun and engaging, something you can play over and over again.

Win Tournament Mode To Become Champion

The Blast Ball Blimp circles overhead  while the Game Announcer gives the pregame commentary and delivers the post game commentary with in-depth Team Stats, Player Stats and Game Highlight pictures. Compete and win the challenging 3 round, single elimination Tournament Mode to become the Blast Ball Champion.

Features
  • Ballers can Stiff Arm, Hurdle, Juke, Spin, Dive and more
  • Rookie, Pro and All-Star difficulties
  • Play to 3, 5 or 7 points
  • Casual, Advanced and Random play modes
  • Select from 9 teams
  • Play in Day or Night conditions
  • Tournament mode
  • User Profile with stat tracking
  • Game Announcer with commentary
  • Game Recap with Team Stats, Player Stats and Highlight pics
  • Latest updates
    • Helmets can be knocked off when hit
    • Mouth pieces can fly out when hit
    • Helmet visors, tattoos, arm bands and arm sleeves 
  • New "Weather Effects"
    • Snow, Rain, Fog
  • New "Themes" can be loaded
    • Changes look and feel of the Stadium with dancing "Mascots"
    • Ex. The "Halloween" or "Christmas" Theme
#Goals

As a solo developer my goal is to make a fun, simple, re-playable little football game that's easy to pick up and play but also engaging. It's now in a state to play around with and get some feedback from the community.

If anyone likes the game then the plan is to continue development that will fix bugs, add features and polish the game to really take it to another level. 

Future Plans
  • Add Season Mode
  • Enhance Offensive AI
  • Enhance Defensive AI
  • Online Stats Leaderboards
  • Overall Polish
  • Bug Fixes
  • And More
Install Instructions
  • Extract Blast Ball v1.xx..zip and run the Blast Ball.exe.
  • Use a Xbox controller for best experience.
  • For Best Experience
    • Set Unity's Graphics Settings
      • Screen Resolution: 1920 x 1080
      • Graphics Quality: Ultra, Very High, High
